title: MultiModal RAG with LLaVA VLMs
author: Gautam Chutani, Shilpi Varshney
description:
This repository contains how to setup basic MultiModal RAG and other use-cases with LLaVa via vLLM on CPU and LLaVa-Next Vision Language Model available on watsonx.ai.
It also contains useful functions for image base64 format conversion, setup vLLM HTTP server and script to prompt 'llava-hf/llama3-llava-next-8b-hf' model on watsonx.ai.
